title: Fettuccine and Sweet Italian Sausage with Light Alfredo Sauce
directions: Prepare pasta according to package directions.
Cook sausage in large skillet over medium heat until no longer pink; drain. Return to skillet. Add pasta and sauce; heat through. Top with cheese.
ingredients: 1 pound bulk sweet turkey Italian sausage
1 (10 ounce) container BUITONI Refrigerated Light Alfredo Sauce
1/3 cup BUITONI Refrigerated Freshly Shredded Parmesan Cheese
